materials.raw_text:
- Erbium (Er): 10 g
- Mercury (Hg): 1 g
- Indium (In): 70 g
- Nickel (Ni): 40 g

sourcing.instructions:
- Erbium: Purchase from a chemical supplier or online marketplace specializing in rare earth metals.
- Mercury: Obtain from a licensed chemical supplier, ensuring proper safety protocols.
- Indium: Available from metal supply companies or online specialty stores.
- Nickel: Commonly found in metal supply stores or online.
